General.Name: Detection Technology OY
General.Description: Detection Technology Oyj provides X-ray detector solutions for medical, security, and industrial applications in Finland and internationally. The company offers medical CT detectors; security CT detectors; photon-counting detectors; and line scan detectors, including linear detector arrays, detectors boards, and flat-panel detectors. Its products are used in computed tomography, and dental and surgical imaging applications; baggage, parcel and mail, cargo, container, vehicle, and people for security applications; and food industry, automotive, recycling and sorting, mining, and other industrial applications. Detection Technology Oyj was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Espoo, Finland.
